Live from NPR News in Culver City California I'm Janine Herb's President Trump welcomed pastor Andrew Brunson to the White House today celebrating his released from detention in Turkey as NPR's Tamara Keith reports the evangelical pastor had been held in that country for more than two years
Brunson and his family sat next to Trump in the oval office marking the end of what had been a harrowing two years Branson an American evangelical Christian pastor with a small church in Turkey was swept up in a crackdown
